DOC.brief_summary: This study test efficacy safety PHX1149T combination metformin , glitazone , metformin glitazone subject Type 2 diabetes 12 week . After complete 12 week double blind part study , subject enter open label extension study
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy PHX1149T Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Key Entry Criteria : Type 2 diabetes mellitus , diagnose least 4 month 12 year prior screen . Male nonpregnant , nonlactating ( plan become pregnant study ) female subject BMI 25 48 kg/m2 , inclusive . For India BMI 23 48 kg/m2 , inclusive . Current treatment Type 2 diabetes mellitus stable dose metformin 1500 mg ( high tolerate dose ) , TZD ( label dose ) , metformin + TZD dos use accordance product label least 4 week ( metformin ) 10 week ( TZD ) prior screen ( Visit 1 ) . Fasting plasma glucose 118 220 mg/dL ( 6.6 12.2 mmol/L ) , inclusive ; HbA1c 7.3 % 11.0 % , inclusive ; fast plasma C peptide great 0.26 nmol/L screening . For Argentina allow upper limit HbA1c â‰¤ 10.5 % . For Canada upper limit 10.0 % No Type 1 diabetes mellitus mark diabetic longterm complication .
